PLEASE NOTE THAT PIXAR HAS A LONG-STANDING COMPANY POLICY AGAINST ACCEPTING OR REVIEWING UNSOLICITED SUBMISSIONS OF CREATIVE MATERIALS. PLEASE DO NOT SEND US YOUR SCRIPTS, STORY IDEAS OR OTHER CREATIVE MATERIALS THROUGH THIS WEBSITE. WE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO CONSIDER THEM.
